title: "We really want to keep the FEEL of Volibear.."
body:
That's why we're going to remove his attack speed and turn him into another "slow but hard hitting" juggernaut (read: the same kind that will never be good) even though a huge portion of his identity is being one of the only attack speed focused juggernauts in that game 

this reworks already doomed gg, should've been CertainlyT
